doc:
Joy Franz https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joy_Franz 0 Joy Franz (born June 13, 1941 in Modesto, California) is an American actress and singer, best known for her stage work. She played Susan in the original 1972 West End production of Stephen Sondheim's Company, and the role of Cinderella's Stepmother in the original 1987 Broadway production of Sondheim's Into the Woods. She was one of the Street Singers in the world premiere of Leonard Bernstein's Mass at the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts on September 8, 1971. She currently portrays the role of the Mother in My Damn Channel's television series Horrible People. Joy_Franz ( born June_13_,_1941 in Modesto , California ) is an_American_actress_and_singer , best_known for her_stage_work . She played Susan in the_original_1972_West_End_production of Stephen_Sondheim 's_Company , and the_role of Cinderella 's_Stepmother in the_original_1987_Broadway_production of Sondheim 's_Into the_Woods . She was one of the_Street_Singers in the_world_premiere of Leonard_Bernstein 's_Mass at the_John_F._Kennedy_Center for the_Performing_Arts on September_8_,_1971 . She currently portrays the_role of the_Mother in My_Damn_Channel 's_television_series_Horrible_People .
